select
to_char(sales_date, 'yyyy-mm') as sales_date, sum(total_amount) as total_amount
'누적 매출' as sales_date, sum(total_amount) as total_amount
to_char(sales_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as sales_date, total_amount as total_amount
from sales_report where studycafe_idx = #{studycafe_idx}
and sales_date >= to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and sales_date <= to_date(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
group by to_char(sales_date, 'yyyy-mm')
group by '누적 매출'
order by sales_date asc
